CustomField.description:
AMs are currently manually prioritizing their accounts (accounts with high potential, risky accounts, middle of the field, etc) in a spreadsheet.
Account management prioritization tiering. Current definitions: Tier 1 = High Potential Tier 2 = Middle of the Field Tier 3 = Risky Accounts Tier 4 = Low Potential
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account management prioritization tiering. Current definitions: Tier 1 = High Potential Tier 2 = Middle of the Field Tier 3 = Risky Accounts Tier 4 = Low Potential
CustomField.label: Account Management Tier
